channel.title: Help with PI
channel.description: Guys which folder to edit the coords when a new players login and the place they are in? i cant find it. So which folder to change the coords when they first time login?

item.title: Help with PI
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii_is_hack ii bandos ii is hacked
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii_is_hack wrote:

To change the starting location, first open up Config.java, located: src/server/Config.java.
Look for

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = public static final int START_LOCATION_Y =

If you attempted to change this, and it didnâ€™t work, please try the following.
Open the Player class, located: src/server/model/players/Player.java.

Look for:

teleportToX = teleportToY =

change it there then

Read full topic
